description: Comprehensive documentation of technical and organisational measures taken to manage risks to the security of networks and electronic communications services, including risk assessment, incident prevention, and impact minimisation measures
auditor_questions: Show me your documented security measures for network and service protection
How do you assess and manage risks to the security of your networks?
What measures are in place to prevent and minimise the impact of security incidents?
How do you ensure business continuity of your electronic communications services?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic security measures documented, risk assessment performed annually
maturity_levels.intermediate: Comprehensive risk management framework, regular vulnerability assessments, incident prevention controls
maturity_levels.advanced: Continuous risk monitoring, automated threat detection, resilience testing, zero-trust architecture

requirement_summary: Implementation and enforcement of security measures
description: Audit results and test reports demonstrating the effective implementation of security measures mandated by the competent authority, including compliance with technical implementing measures and security audit results
auditor_questions: Show me the results of your most recent security audit or assessment
How do you demonstrate compliance with security measures mandated by the national authority?
What remediation actions have been taken based on audit findings?
How do you verify the effectiveness of implemented security controls?

maturity_levels.basic: Annual security audit completed, basic compliance verified
maturity_levels.intermediate: Regular penetration testing, structured remediation tracking, compliance dashboards
maturity_levels.advanced: Continuous compliance monitoring, automated security validation, third-party assurance programme

description: Documented procedure for reporting security incidents with significant impact on network or service operation to the competent authority, including initial notification timelines, impact assessment criteria, and user notification requirements
auditor_questions: Show me your procedure for reporting security incidents to the competent authority
How do you assess whether an incident has a significant impact requiring notification?
What are your notification timelines and escalation procedures?
Show me records of incidents reported in the past year and their resolution

maturity_levels.basic: Basic reporting procedure exists, manual incident assessment
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated impact assessment criteria, structured reporting templates, SLA tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Real-time incident classification, automated authority notification, integrated incident management platform

description: Documentation of cooperation with ENISA including adoption of technical guidance, participation in cross-border incident response, and implementation of harmonised security requirements
auditor_questions: How do you incorporate ENISA technical guidance into your security measures?
Show me evidence of cooperation with ENISA on cross-border security matters
How do you implement harmonised security requirements recommended by ENISA?
What role does ENISA guidance play in your security framework?

maturity_levels.basic: Awareness of ENISA guidance, basic implementation of recommendations
maturity_levels.intermediate: Systematic adoption of ENISA technical guidelines, participation in ENISA activities
maturity_levels.advanced: Active contribution to ENISA standards development, leadership in cross-border security cooperation

requirement_summary: Contract information and transparency for consumers
description: Documentation demonstrating that consumer contracts contain all mandatory information including service characteristics, pricing, duration, renewal terms, termination conditions, and quality parameters in a clear and comprehensible manner
auditor_questions: Show me a sample contract and how it includes all mandatory information requirements
How do you ensure contract terms are presented in a clear and comprehensible manner?
What is your process for providing a contract summary in the standardised format?
How do you notify consumers of contract modifications?

maturity_levels.basic: Contracts include mandatory information, basic contract summary provided
maturity_levels.intermediate: Standardised contract summary format, multi-channel delivery, regular compliance reviews
maturity_levels.advanced: Interactive digital contracts, personalised information presentation, automated compliance checking

description: Documented procedure for enabling number portability including porting timelines, process for receiving and donating providers, minimisation of service interruption, and consumer information requirements
auditor_questions: Show me your number portability procedure and average porting times
How do you minimise service interruption during the porting process?
What information do you provide to consumers about their portability rights?
How do you handle porting requests and what is your rejection rate and reasons?

maturity_levels.basic: Porting procedure exists, basic compliance with maximum porting timeline
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated porting workflows, reduced porting times, consumer notification system
maturity_levels.advanced: Same-day porting capability, seamless transition process, real-time status tracking for consumers

description: Documentation demonstrating compliance with universal service obligations including provision of adequate broadband internet access and voice communications at an affordable price, accessibility for persons with disabilities, and geographic coverage requirements
auditor_questions: How do you ensure universal service availability across your designated area?
Show me evidence of affordable pricing for consumers with low income or special needs
What measures ensure accessibility for persons with disabilities?
How do you report on geographic coverage and service quality?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic universal service provision, compliance reporting submitted
maturity_levels.intermediate: Targeted affordability programmes, accessibility features, coverage mapping
maturity_levels.advanced: Proactive coverage expansion, innovative accessibility solutions, real-time quality monitoring

description: Policy addressing supply chain security risks for electronic communications networks and services, including vendor risk assessment, critical component sourcing, and third-party security requirements
auditor_questions: Show me your supply chain security policy for network equipment and services
How do you assess security risks from third-party vendors and suppliers?
What criteria do you use for critical component sourcing decisions?
How do you monitor ongoing supplier compliance with security requirements?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic vendor assessment process, security requirements in procurement contracts
maturity_levels.intermediate: Structured vendor risk management, regular supplier audits, critical component tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Continuous supplier monitoring, automated risk scoring, diversified sourcing strategy, supply chain transparency
